name: Animatman
tagline: a jQuery package for  sprite animation
body:
### Welcome to Animatman Pages.
this a jQuery Plugin for simple build animation
just using sprite image, and set width/height.
這是一個JQuery的套件用來製作簡單的動畫，
只要使用Sprite的圖檔，然後設定寬和高即可

Example / 範例 :

    $.animatman($('#demo1'),
	'./images/sprite_width_01.png',
	'75',
	'100', {
	})
    $.animatman($('#demo2'),
	'./images/sprite_height_01.png',
	'100',
	'75', {
		fps: 12
	})
    $.animatman($('#demo3'),
	'./images/ramonaflowers.png',
	'125',
	'180', {
		fps: 12
	})
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
